original_text: So they drew up Jeremiah with cords, and took him up out of the dungeon: and Jeremiah remained in the court of the prison.
korean_text: 그들이 줄로 예레미야를 구덩이에서 끌어낸지라 예레미야가 시위대 뜰에 머무니라

sentences.original_text: So they drew up Jeremiah with cords
and took him up out of the dungeon
and Jeremiah remained in the court of the prison
